value.stringValue: The Service {!$Record.Name} has been cancelled, please review

decisions.description: If "yes" then create "SEO Migration | Web Builder" task assigned to Web Builder. If "no" send email notification to Adam and status = SEO Migration Audit
decisions.name: Client_agrees_to_upsell
decisions.label: Client agrees to upsell

decisions.description: If picklist = yes, create task "SEO Migration | Web Builder", if no then Status = "On Hold"
decisions.name: Migration_falls_in_scope
decisions.label: Migration falls in scope

Flow.description: Cancellation Date when Cancelled, Approval Process when Sent for Approval, MLS Counters

formulas.name: DueDateTaskQA
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.RecordType.Name}, "Website Launches", {!DueDate2BusinessDays}, "Property Website", {!NextBusinessDay}, "Design Refresh",{!NextBusinessDay}, "Template Change",{!NextBusinessDay}, "Platform Migration", {!DueDate2BusinessDays}, {!NextBusinessDay})

formulas.name: forDueDateQuarterly
formulas.expression: CASE( {!SScount}, 0, IF(AND( OR( {!forMonth}=1, {!forMonth}=2, {!forMonth}=3), {!forThisYear}=0) , DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),03,31), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,03,31)), 1, IF( AND(OR( {!forMonth}=1, {!forMonth}=2, {!forMonth}=3, {!forMonth}=4, {!forMonth}=5, {!forMonth}=6),{!forThisYear}=0) , DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),06,30), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,06,30)), 2, IF( AND(OR( {!forMonth}=10, {!forMonth}=11, {!forMonth}=12),{!forThisYear}=1 ), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,09,30), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),09,30)), 3, IF( AND(OR( {!forMonth}=10, {!forMonth}=11, {!forMonth}=12),{!forThisYear}=0) , DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,31), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,12,31)), DATE(2023,3,31) )

formulas.name: forNewClientTaskName
formulas.expression: IF( {!$Record.Account__r.VIP__c} = true, " VIP New Client Set Up", "New Client Set Up" )

formulas.name: forThisYear
formulas.expression: CASE( {!SScount}, 0, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),02,15),1,0), 1, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),05,15),1,0), 2, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),08,15),1,0), 3, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),11,15),1,0), 0 )

formulas.name: LastDay
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH( {!DateValue} ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( {!DateValue} ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( {!DateValue} ), MONTH({!DateValue} ) + 1, 1) - 1)

textTemplates.name: BillingTemplate
bodyClientAgrees
bodyCreditReasonChanged
bodyEmail
bodyPaidMediaApproved
textTemplates.text: The Ad for {!$Record.Name} has been approved by the client, please launch the campaign.

textTemplates.name: bodyPaidMediaApprovedAM
textTemplates.text: The campaign for {!$Record.Name} is now Live.

textTemplates.name: CancelledEmail
textTemplates.text:
Hi there!


The service {!$Record.Name} has been cancelled, please take this in mind.

textTemplates.name: NewBodyText
textTemplates.text: You have been assigned to a new service https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: OnHoldBody
textTemplates.text: The Service stage is on hold for {!$Record.Name} : https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: ReadyToLaunchBody
textTemplates.text: Website is being prepared to launch for {!$Record.Name} : https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: RevisionBody
textTemplates.text: Stage has been moved and team is working on it/ reviewing for {!$Record.Name}: https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: WDBodyText
textTemplates.text: The staging link is ready and can be sent to client for {!$Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: WebsiteDraftBody
textTemplates.text: Hi Team, the build for service {!$Record.Name} has started: https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}
